lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The bill, already passed by the House, would enable 1987 winter wheat and feedgrains farmers hit by Midwestern flooding last year to receive at least 92 pct of their federal income support payments even if they did not plant.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dole and Grassley are also considering an amendment that would offer a two dlr per bushel bonus payment to corn farmers for any erodible cropland they enrolled in the conservation reserve program last year.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: David Boren (D-Okla.) was eyeing a measure that would allow cotton producers to receive disaster aid if the quality of their crop was hurt by flooding last year.
